title: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made. Additionally, code assist does not appear as expected.
OB: I open a file and activate code assist. The file is marked as dirtied in the editor, indicating that changes have been made. However, I have not made any changes to the file. Furthermore, the code assist functionality does not appear.
EB: When I open a file and activate code assist, the file should not be marked as dirtied if no changes have been made. The code assist functionality should appear as expected.
SR:
1. Open a file in the editor.
2. Activate code assist.
3. Observe if the file is marked as dirtied without any changes having been made.
4. Observe if the code assist functionality appears.
